summary.blockquote: WARNINGWarning: This is a property of the original CSS Flexible Box Layout Module draft, and has been replaced by a newer standard. See flexbox for information about the current standard.

remarks.para: The box-orient CSS property sets whether an element lays out its contents horizontally or vertically.

CSSBox-orient.value: The inline and block axes are the writing-mode dependent keywords which, in English, map to horizontal and vertical respectively.
